LanguageData.VFE_DrugCabinet.label: допоміжний стіл нарколаболаторії
LanguageData.VFE_DrugCabinet.description: Increases work speed when placed near a drug lab. One workbench links up to two drug cabinets.
LanguageData.VFE_DrugCabinet_Blueprint.label: drug cabinet (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_DrugCabinet_Blueprint_Install.label: drug cabinet (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_DrugCabinet_Frame.label: drug cabinet (building)
LanguageData.VFE_DrugCabinet_Frame.description: Increases work speed when placed near a drug lab. One workbench links up to two drug cabinets.
LanguageData.VFE_MachiningCabinet.label: допоміжний стіл ремісника
LanguageData.VFE_MachiningCabinet.description: Increases work speed when placed near a machining table. One workbench links up to two machining cabinets.
LanguageData.VFE_MachiningCabinet_Blueprint.label: machining cabinet (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_MachiningCabinet_Frame.label: machining cabinet (building)
LanguageData.VFE_MachiningCabinet_Frame.description: Increases work speed when placed near a machining table. One workbench links up to two machining cabinets.
LanguageData.VFE_SmithyCabinet.label: допоміжний стіл металурга
LanguageData.VFE_SmithyCabinet.description: Increases work speed when placed near a smithy. One workbench links up to two smithy cabinets.
LanguageData.VFE_SmithyCabinet_Blueprint.label: smithing cabinet (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_SmithyCabinet_Frame.label: smithing cabinet (building)
LanguageData.VFE_SmithyCabinet_Frame.description: Increases work speed when placed near a smithy. One workbench links up to two smithy cabinets.
LanguageData.VFE_KitchenSinkCabinet.label: раковина кухаря
LanguageData.VFE_KitchenSinkCabinet.description: Increases work speed when placed nearby a cooking stove.
LanguageData.VFE_KitchenSinkCabinet_Blueprint.label: kitchen sink cabinet (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_KitchenSinkCabinet_Frame.label: kitchen sink cabinet (building)
LanguageData.VFE_KitchenSinkCabinet_Frame.description: Increases work speed when placed nearby a cooking stove.
LanguageData.VFE_TailorCabinet.label: допоміжний стіл кравця
LanguageData.VFE_TailorCabinet.description: Increases work speed when placed near a tailoring table. One workbench links up to two tailor cabinets.
LanguageData.VFE_TailorCabinet_Blueprint.label: tailor cabinet (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_TailorCabinet_Frame.label: tailor cabinet (building)
LanguageData.VFE_TailorCabinet_Frame.description: Increases work speed when placed near a tailoring table. One workbench links up to two tailor cabinets.
LanguageData.VFE_FabricationCabinet.label: промисловий комп'ютер
LanguageData.VFE_FabricationCabinet.description: Підвищує швидкість роботи, якщо розміщений поруч із верстатом для виробництва. Один верстат може пришвидшувати до двох верстатів.
LanguageData.VFE_FabricationCabinet_Blueprint.label: fabrication cabinet (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_FabricationCabinet_Frame.label: fabrication cabinet (building)
LanguageData.VFE_FabricationCabinet_Frame.description: Increases work speed when placed near a fabrication bench. One workbench can link up to two fabrication cabinets.
